諩字的基本解释

諩
pǔ
古同“谱”。

諩字的汉语字典释义

[①]［pǔ］
［《廣韻》博古切，上姥，幫。］
“谱1”的繁体字。亦作“諩1”。
(1)按照事物的类别或系統编排记录。
(2)引申为布置。
(3)按照事物类别或系統编成的表册、书籍。
(4)曲谱。
(5)作曲。
(6)大致的标准；依据。
(7)犹左右。表示约数。
(8)件；桩。

諩字的康熙字典解释

【酉集上】【言字部】　諩； 康熙笔画：16； 页码：页1170第13
【類篇】同譜，省。【春秋序】譜第。【註】譜，本又作諩。　又人名。與諩、盂諩，見【宋史·宗室表】。

諩字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体韩国明朝体
諩字的起名意思

暂无。

Basic explanation of words
Stubborn
pǔ
Gu Tong "spectrum".
Stubborn
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①] [pǔ]
["Guangyun" Boguqie, grandma, help. ]
Traditional characters of "谱1". Also known as "諩1".
(1) Arrange records according to the category or system of things.
(2) The extension is layout.
(3) Lists and books compiled according to the category or system of things.
(4) Scores.
(5) Composition.
(6) Rough standards; basis.
(7) Still left and right. Represents approximate numbers.
(8) Pieces; piles.

Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[You Ji 1] [Words Department] 　諩; Kangxi strokes: 16; Page number: 1170-13
[Classes] Same spectrum, province. 【Spring and Autumn Preface】Put the first. [Note] The spectrum, the book is also used as a beetle.　Another name. See "Song History · Clan Table" for the relationship between the scorpion and the scorpion.
